item.title: Sudan Crisis: An Overview
item.author: Biyaser Abuelgasim,
item.description: On 19th December 2018, hundreds of people protested in Atbara and several other cities in Sudan against the rising costs of living and dramatic worsening of economic conditions. Even bread, a commodity we take for granted, tripled in price. The protests spread quickly to other cities, including the â€¦
